title: Complementary and Integrative Medicine
description: The terms "complementary" and "integrative" are sometimes used to refer to ways of managing cancer-related symptoms that are used along with standard treatments.
cleaned_text: The terms "complementary" and "integrative" are sometimes used to refer to ways of managing cancer related symptoms that are used along with standard treatments. Here you'll find general information to help you better understand these terms and how to decide if using them is right for you.
